definition: road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
General Douglas MacArthur (1880-1964), US commander in Pacific during WW2, sacked in 1951 by President Truman for exceeding orders during the Korean war
pinyin: Dao4 ge2 la1 si1 · Mai4 ke4 a1 se4

sentences.english: His father, Michael Douglas, wrote a letter to the judge asking for leniency.
sentences.chinese: 父亲道格拉斯致函法官恳求宽大处理。

sentences.english: Douglas Å loves to do MJ since he was a little boy.
sentences.chinese: 道格拉斯从小就很喜欢模仿迈克杰克逊。

sentences.english: Douglas had his own treasured jokes and sequences in the original radio series.
sentences.chinese: 道格拉斯自己对广播剧中某些笑话和段落十分珍视。

sentences.english: Douglas believed that the northwest should have two representatives in the cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 道格拉斯认为西北地区应该有两名代表进入内阁。

sentences.english: Widow Douglas is trying to civilize me?and I won't stand for that.
sentences.chinese: 道格拉斯寡妇想要教化我，那我可受不了。

sentences.english: My son, Douglas, loves to play with toy guns.
sentences.chinese: 儿子道格拉斯酷爱玩具枪。

sentences.english: H. Douglas would come to Alberta to serve as its expert advisor.
sentences.chinese: 道格拉斯能够前往阿尔伯达省内担任专家顾问。

sentences.english: Stick with it Douglas. Your fortitude is an example to us all.
sentences.chinese: 道格拉斯坚持下去，你的坚忍不拔是我们大家的榜样。

sentences.english: The setting was Douglas' home in the Rocky Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 浪漫场景就设在道格拉斯在洛基山的家中。

sentences.english: Douglas camera captured the history of this unforgettable moment.
sentences.chinese: 道格拉斯用照相机拍下这个难忘的历史瞬间。

sentences.english: Douglas suggested that MacLachlan come to London to discuss the matter;
sentences.chinese: 道格拉斯却建议麦克拉克伦到伦敦讨论此事。

sentences.english: you know what, douglas? you are a real boring whinger.
sentences.chinese: 道格拉斯你知道吗，你是一个牢骚满腹的家伙。

sentences.english: Caroline and Douglas will be there too.
sentences.chinese: 卡罗琳和道格拉斯也将出席。

sentences.english: Glowing Matrix Beaver graphic T-shirt by Roots x Douglas Coupland.
sentences.chinese: 比弗图形矩阵发光T恤的根x道格拉斯库普兰。

sentences.english: Discovery?. The last flight of Douglas Wheelock.
sentences.chinese: 道格拉斯会德丰的最后一次飞行。

sentences.english: Bolman has studied regional variation in Douglas fir seed yields.
sentences.chinese: 鲍尔曼曾研究过道格拉斯冷杉种子产量地区间的差异。

definition: Clark T. Randt Jr. (1945-), US ambassador to Beijing 2001-2009
